trans-unit.source: Implements a type converter for converting <xref:System.Double> (used as the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.Zoom%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) to and from other types.
trans-unit.target: 实现用于转换的类型转换器<xref:System.Double>(用作的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.Zoom%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) 与其他类型。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Documents.ZoomPercentageConverter"></xref> class.
Converts the <xref:System.Double> (used as the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.Zoom%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) to an object of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 将转换<xref:System.Double>(用作的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.Zoom%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) 为指定类型的对象。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue> may be returned to indicate that the converter produced no value and that the fallback (if available) or default value should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue>可能返回以指示转换器没有生成任何值，回退 （如果可用） 或默认值应改为使用。</xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue>

trans-unit.source: Pass `null` for `parameter`.

This parameter is required by the signature of <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A>, and is used by some implementations to provide contextual information to the converter; but it is not used in this class.
trans-unit.target: 此参数所需的签名<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A>，并且某些实现的情况下用于上下文信息提供给转换器; 但它不用于此类。</xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.Convert%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.Zoom%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The type to which `value` is to be converted.
This must be <xref:System.Double> or <xref:System.String>.
See Remarks.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
See Remarks.
The language and culture assumed during the conversion.
trans-unit.target: 语言和区域性假定在此转换过程。

trans-unit.source: Returns a previously converted value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.Zoom%2A?displayProperty=fullName> back to a <xref:System.Double> that can be assigned to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.Zoom%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 返回以前转换后的值的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.Zoom%2A?displayProperty=fullName>回<xref:System.Double>，可分配给<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.Zoom%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The data binding engine calls this method when it moves a value from the binding target to the binding source.
trans-unit.target: 从绑定目标值移动到绑定源时，数据绑定引擎将调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue> may be returned to indicate that the converter produced no value and that the fallback (if available) or default value should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue>可能返回以指示转换器没有生成任何值，回退 （如果可用） 或默认值应改为使用。</xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue>

trans-unit.source: Pass `null` for `parameter`.

This parameter is required by the signature of <xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A>, and is used by some implementations to provide contextual information to the converter; but it is not used in this class.
trans-unit.target: 此参数所需的签名<xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A>，并且某些实现的情况下用于上下文信息提供给转换器; 但它不用于此类。</xref:System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter.ConvertBack%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object that is to be converted back to a <xref:System.Double>.
The type of `value`.
This must be <xref:System.Double> or <xref:System.String>.
See Remarks.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
See Remarks.
The language and culture assumed during the conversion.
trans-unit.target: 语言和区域性假定在此转换过程。
